entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High 8.

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southwest 40 gusting to 60 over southwestern sections this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
